name: International Airline & Aviation College (IAAC)
about: International Airline & Aviation College (IAAC) is a private educational institution based in Sri Lanka, established in October 2015. IAAC offers internationally recognized diploma programs in Travel, Airline, and Aviation, designed to enhance students' knowledge, skills, and confidence. The college aims to provide comprehensive, industry-relevant courses that cover all aspects of the aviation and airline industry. With a focus on educational effectiveness and student-centered services, IAAC is committed to preparing students for successful careers in the aviation sector. IAAC strives to maintain high standards and is working towards accreditation to ensure the quality of its programs. By joining IAAC, students can gain the necessary expertise and credentials to excel in their chosen careers.
services:
["Diploma In Airline Cabin Crew
Diploma In Airport Ground Operations
Diploma In Airline Ticketing","Reservations & Marketing
Diploma In Air Cargo & Logistics
Pilot Training Programs"]
